sections.introduction: Welcome to Adrián Aguirre's Privacy Policy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website.
sections.informationCollection: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
sections.useOfInformation: We use the information we collect to:
usePoints: Respond to your inquiries and requests
Personalize your experience and provide you with relevant content
Improve our website based on the information and feedback we receive from you
Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities related to our website

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier.
cookies.control: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our website.

security.title: Security
security.description: The security of your personal information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

sections.contact: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that websites you visit place on your computer to improve your website experience.

types.name: Essential Cookies
types.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled in our systems.

types.name: Performance Cookies
types.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site.

types.name: Functionality Cookies
types.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization.

types.name: Advertising Cookies
types.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners.

control.title: How to Control Cookies
control.description: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, all applicable laws and regulations.
